Policy reminder: Workplace conduct guidelines This is a gentle but firm reminder that workplace communication must remain professional at all times, including casual chats, Slack channels, and after-hours gatherings. Comments about a person’s body, sex life, or attractiveness—even if framed as “compliments” or “jokes”—constitute sexual harassment if they make someone feel uncomfortable. We’ve had recent reports of flirtatious banter that blurred into unwelcome territory. Please reflect on your language. If you’re unsure, ask yourself: would I say this in front of my parent or my boss? If not, don’t say it at all.
